BiblioData.Title: Red surface emitting laser element, image forming device, and image display apparatus
BiblioData.Abstract: A red surface emitting laser element (3000) includes a first reflector (302), a second reflector (308) including a p-type semiconductor multilayer film, an active layer (305) between the first reflector (302) and the second reflector (308), and a p-type semiconductor spacer layer (307) between the active layer (305) and the second reflector (308), the p-type semiconductor spacer layer (307) having a thickness of 100 nm or more and 350 nm or less.

Claims.P: 1. A red surface emitting laser element (3000) comprising:
a first reflector (302);
a second reflector (308) including a p-type semiconductor multilayer film;
an active layer (305) between the first reflector (302) and the second reflector (308); and

a p-type semiconductor spacer layer (307) between the active layer (305) and the second reflector (308), the p-type semiconductor spacer layer (307) having a thickness of 100 nm or more and 350 nm or less.
2. The red surface emitting laser element (3000) according to claim 1, wherein the thickness of the p-type semiconductor spacer layer (307) is 150 nm or more and 300 nm or less.
3. The red surface emitting laser element (3000) according to claim 1 or 2, wherein the p-type semiconductor spacer layer (307) contains aluminum, indium, and phosphorus.
4. The red surface emitting laser element (3000) according to claim 1, wherein the p-type semiconductor spacer layer (307) contains AlxGayIn1-x-yP (0.45 x + y 0.55, 0.25 x 0.55, 0 y 0.30).
5. The red surface emitting laser element (3000) according to claim 4, wherein the p-type semiconductor spacer layer (307) contains AlxGayIn1-x-yP (0.50 x + y 0.52, 0.35 x 0.52, 0 y 0.17).
6. The red surface emitting laser element (3000) according to any one of claims 1 to 5, wherein the p-type semiconductor multilayer film contains aluminum and arsenic.

7. The red surface emitting laser element (3000) according to any one of claims 1 to 6, wherein the p-type semiconductor multilayer film includes a plurality of pairs of layers stacked, each pair including a first layer and a second layer having different refractive indices; and
wherein at least one of the first layer and the second layer contains aluminum, gallium, and arsenic.
8. The red surface emitting laser element (3000) according to any one of claims 1 to 7, wherein the second reflector (308) is composed of a semiconductor material having a lattice matching with GaAs.

9. The red surface emitting laser element (3000) according to any one of claims 1 to 8, wherein the active layer (305) is a quantum well active layer including a layer composed of GaInP and a layer composed of AlGaInP.

10. The red surface emitting laser element (3000) according to any one of claims 1 to 9, wherein the first reflector (302) includes an n-type semiconductor multilayer film, and the red surface emitting laser element (3000) further comprises an n-type semiconductor spacer layer (303) between the first reflector and the active layer.
11. The red surface emitting laser element (3000) according to any one of claims 1 to 10, further comprising another spacer layer between the p-type semiconductor spacer layer and the active layer.

12. The red surface emitting laser element (3000) according to claim 10, wherein the active layer (305), the p-type semiconductor spacer layer (307), and the n-type semiconductor spacer layer (303) constitute a resonator, and the resonator has an asymmetrical structure in which the active layer (305) is not located at the center of the resonator in a cavity length direction.

13. The red surface emitting laser element (3000) according to claim 12, wherein a thickness of the p-type semiconductor spacer layer (307) is larger than a thickness of the n-type semiconductor spacer layer (303).

14. The red surface emitting laser element (3000) according to any one of claims 1 to 13, wherein a cavity length of a resonator including the active layer (305) is 1.5 wavelength or more and 4 wavelength or less.
15. A red surface emitting laser element comprising:
a first reflector (302);
a second reflector (308) including a p-type AlGaAs semiconductor multilayer film;
an active layer (305) between the first reflector (302) and the second reflector (308); and

a p-type AlInP semiconductor spacer layer or a p-type AlGaInP semiconductor spacer layer (307) having a thickness of 100 nm or more and 350 nm or less between the active (305) layer and the second reflector (308).
16. A red surface emitting laser element comprising:
a first reflector (302);
a second reflector (308) including a p-type semiconductor multilayer film;
an active layer (305) between the first reflector (302) and the second reflector (308); and
a p-type semiconductor spacer layer (307) between the active layer (305) and the second reflector (308),
wherein a conduction band edge at X point of the p-type semiconductor multilayer film is lower than a conduction band edge at X point of the p-type semiconductor spacer layer (307), and
a thickness of the p-type semiconductor spacer layer (307) is 100 nm or more and 350 nm or less.
17. The red surface emitting laser element (3000) according to any one of claims 1 to 16, wherein the active layer (305) comprises a plurality of active layers.
18. An image-forming device comprising:
the red surface emitting laser element (3000) according to any one of claims 1 to 17; and
a deflector (910) for reflecting a laser beam output from the laser element (3000) to conduct scanning.
19. The image-forming device according to claim 18, further comprising:
a photosensitive member (900) for forming an electrostatic latent image by a beam deflected by the deflector (910);
a charger (902);
a developer (904); and
a fixer (908).
20. An image-display apparatus comprising:
the red surface emitting laser element (3000) according to any one of claims 1 to 17; and
a deflector (910) for reflecting a laser beam output from the laser element (3000) to conduct scanning.
